name: Walking alone at night
description:
Description:

After a long day at work, you have to make your way back home in the dark of the night. You thought it'd be a relaxing trip back, but something's off. You see weird things.

Controls:

W A S D - move

ESC - pause/ resume game

Source Code: 

Github repository

Devlog coming soon on my YouTube channel.

Development information:

This is my first full 3D game and I made it in a little under a week, I hope you'll enjoy it!
